TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SqlCacheDependencyDatabase extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement

Docs.summary: Configures the SQL cache dependencies databases for an ASP.NET application. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase> allows you to programmatically access and modify the `databases` element of the `sqlCacheDependency` node within the `caching` configuration section.
The SQL cache dependency allows the cached data to be synchronized with the original source. After you configure the relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table, an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> class monitors the table for possible changes.
## Examples The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase> object from the configuration file of an existing Web application.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/CS/sqlcachedependencydatabase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/VB/sqlcachedependencydatabase.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the connection name for the database.
Docs.value: A string that specifies the name of a database connection string within the configuration section.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase.ConnectionStringName%2A> property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `connectionName` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file. The connection name identifies an element in the `connectionStrings` section which contains the database connection string.
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase.ConnectionStringName%2A> property.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/CS/sqlcachedependencydatabase.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/VB/sqlcachedependencydatabase.vb#4)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the database.
Docs.value: A string that specifies the name used by to identify the database.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase.Name%2A> property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `name` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file.
The `name` attribute identifies the database whose table is used for the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency>.
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase.Name%2A> property.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/CS/sqlcachedependencydatabase.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/VB/sqlcachedependencydatabase.vb#3)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the frequency with which the polls the database table for changes.
Docs.value: The database polling time, in milliseconds.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase.PollTime%2A> property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `pollTime` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file.
After you configure the relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table, an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> class monitors the table so that when an item in the table changes, the item is automatically updated in or removed from the cache. The monitoring happens at the frequency specified by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase.PollTime%2A>.
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase.PollTime%2A> property.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/CS/sqlcachedependencydatabase.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/VB/sqlcachedependencydatabase.vb#2)]
